thread.title: FIERY! Salman Khan-Sonam Kapoor Sizzle On The Cover Of Harper Bazaar!
thread.title_full: FIERY! Salman Khan-Sonam Kapoor Sizzle On The Cover Of Harper Bazaar!

title: FIERY! Salman Khan-Sonam Kapoor Sizzle On The Cover Of Harper Bazaar!
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Superstar Salman Khan who is all set for his forthcoming release, Prem Ratan Dhan Payo with the fashionista Sonam Kapoor , sizzles with her on the cover of Harper Bazaar Bride October edition.And we gotta say, they are just nailing it in the stylish traditional look, which they have donned for the cover.In this photoshoot, Salman can be seen in a white embroidered maroon sherwani, and not forgetting to mention with his intense kohl eyes. Whereas, his co-star Sonam Kapoor is looking stunningly gorgeous in a bridal maroon outfit, designed by none other than Manish Malhotra . 
Currently, the duo are surely on the seventh heaven, as their recently released trailer has crossed 10 million views on the YouTube.Directed by Sooraj Barjatya, the film is purely family oriented, which also casts Swara Bhaskar, Neil Nitin Mukesh & Anupam Kher in pivotal roles.Check out the exclusive cover picture of Salman-Sonam on Harper Bazaar here!
